Key Variables: Total ESSER Funding, Expenditure by Object, Expenditure by Function
How did they get their data?: This dashboard tracks CARES ESSER I, CRRSA ESSER II and ARP ESSER III expenditures that districts have submitted for reimbursement.
Notes: Data for almost every state is available on Tableau

Dataset Source: The Common Core of Data (CCD), collected by the National Center for Education Statistics (NCES)
Key Variables: Revenue, Revenue per Pupil, Expenditure, Expenditure per Pupil
Notes: Also has data on school modality by state.

Data Description: School-level race/ethnicity and free/reduced price lunch eligibility data from the 1991-92 to 2020-21 school years.
Key Variables: porportion free/reduced lunch, porportion ethnicity, total enrollment
How did they get their data?: CCD Data. The LSDD imputes missing and implausible data, improves school ID linkages, and links charter schools to geographic districts, among other data quality improvements.
Web scraping, MCH Strategic Data’s “COVID-19 IMPACT: School District Status,”, NCED, EdOpportunity Project, NYT, USElectionAtlas, USAFacts, CDC

Key Variables: Instructional Status, Masking Policy, COVID Cases
How did they get their data?: Requested data from State Education Agencies

Data Description: The spread of COVID-19 and its effect on people in the United States
Key Variables: Instructional Status, COVID symptoms, masking, vaccinations, mental health, testing

Data Description: Whether people access the internet, and how people access the internet to create data about computer and internet use.
Key Variables: With a computer, With a broadband Internet Subscription

Data Description: Social capital, including family unity, family interaction, social support, community health, institutional health, collective efficacy, and philanthropic health.
How did they get their data?: American Community Survey, National Survey of Children's Health, Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System, Civic Engagement Supplement, IRS, Election Administration and Voting Survey, census, FBI statistics,

Data Description: Social mobility and a variety of other outcomes from life expectancy to patent rates by neighborhood, college, parental income level, and racial background.
Key Variables: Race, Gender, Income, Facebook Friend Information, Volunteer Group Participation

Data Description: State-by-state ESRI shapefiles of 2020 precinct-level general election results.

Dataset Source: The Educational Opportunity Project at Stanford University
Data Description: Academic performance data across school districts
How did they get their data?: EDFacts from the US Department of Education
